apps.name: PDF Reader and Photo to PDF
apps.description:
PDF Reader and Photo to PDF app ‚Äì the ultimate solution for all your document needs. 

The pdf reader app is more than just a PDF reader and viewer. It serves as an all-in-one file opener, supporting various formats such as XLS, DOCX, and PPT. Whether you need to view spreadsheets, documents, or presentations, this pdf converter app has got you covered. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply looking for an efficient way to manage your files, this pdf viewer app is designed to streamline your document-related tasks.

‚úÖ PDF Reader:
- Easy to open and read PDF files of any size
- Whether it's ebooks, reports, presentations, or forms, you can navigate through your documents with ease, zoom in for details, and highlight important information.
- PDF viewer, e-book reader app

‚úÖ All File Opener:
- Read all file formats: XLS, DOCX, and PPT.
- Say goodbye to compatibility issues - effortlessly access, view, and edit various document types within a single application.

‚úÖ Document Scan
- The built-in document scanning feature allows you to capture text, images, or diagrams from paper documents, turning them into PDFs for easy storage and sharing.

‚úÖ Image to PDF
- Seamlessly convert images into PDF documents.
- Whether you have photos, screenshots, or graphics, this pdf document app empowers you to create PDF files from your images, convert to pdf 

‚úÖ Share PDF
- Share your documents hassle-free. The image to pdf converter app lets you send PDFs and other supported files to colleagues, classmates, or friends with a single tap

‚úÖ Orther functions:
- Manage and delete files
- Bookmark
- Search file
- Document collage
- Sort file

Our pdf viewer ebook reader app is designed to simplify your document handling tasks, enhancing your productivity and efficiency. Say goodbye to the hassle of juggling multiple pdf document opener apps and tools.

Its simplicity, versatility, and robust features make it an essential pdf viewer all in one app for individuals and professionals who deal with digital documents on a regular basis. Enjoy the document opener app today and experience a whole new level of convenience and efficiency in document management.

Thanks for using our pdf file management app!

apps.name: Canva: AI Photo & Video Editor
apps.description:
Canva is your free photo editor, logo maker, collage maker, and video editor in one editing app! Design digital art faster with powerful magic AI tools built-in, like the AI image generator that allows you to transform text to image in just a few minutes Make stunning social media posts and reels, presentations or flyers, create logos, CVs, photo collages and video collages from customizable templates. 

Edit photos & design anything with the AI art generatorüñåÔ∏è: Video editor, collage maker, meme maker, CV maker & logo maker ‚Äì Canva is a simple & easy content creation app for anyone! üé®

‚Ä¢ Facebook posts, Instagram layout designs, banner maker, Instagram post-maker & Instagram reels maker.

‚Ä¢ Apply effects like slow motion and reverse playback, add subtitles to a video collage, or a new background to your green screen video. 
‚Ä¢ Magically sync edits to music with Beat Sync, for quick video editing
‚Ä¢ Automatically translate captions to over 100 languages

SOCIAL MEDIA üì± ‚Äì make and match trendy content & graphic designs
‚Ä¢ Design for Instagram, Snapchat, Facebook, YouTube or LinkedIn.

FREE CONTENT LIBRARY ‚Äì over 2M+ assets

‚Ä¢ 25K+ pre-licensed audio & music tracks

AI MAGIC BUILT-IN ‚ú® ‚Äì Bringing magic and ease of use to your designs 
We‚Äôve supercharged design across the Visual Suite with incredible magical AI-powered capabilities. Including;

CANVA PRO ‚Äì The editing app to boost your graphic design

GRAPHIC DESIGN FOR EVERYONE üé®

apps.name: AliExpress - Shopping App
apps.description:
UNLOCK SHOPPING ON ALIEXPRESS
Prepare to shop like never before and experience a new kind of shopping journey filled with incredible deals across various online stores. Whether you're looking for fashionable clothing, unique gadgets, or trendy shoes, our intuitive AliExpress online marketplace offers the convenience, allowing you to shop anytime and anywhere for a seamless and enjoyable experience‚Äîno matter the temperature outside or your shopping temperament!

DEALS ON SHOES
Are you ready to shop for low prices on that shoe you've been hunting instead of overpaying greedy resellers? AliExpress is your go-to online marketplace for affordable and stylish shoes where you can shop confidently! From sneakers and boots to casual and formal options, our store offers a wide variety for every occasion. Discover fantastic deals as you shop with super low wholesale prices and high discounts on the latest collections. Whether your shoe obsession is temporary or long-term, our marketplace has it all, allowing you to shop without compromising on quality.

EXPLORE THE ULTIMATE STORE
AliExpress is more than just a store‚Äîit‚Äôs your ultimate online marketplace where you can shop for everything you need. With millions of items available, including clothing, electronics, home goods, and of course, shoes, our marketplace fulfills all your shopping desires. You can shop confidently while enjoying free shipping options and daily deals that help you maximize your savings‚Äîwhether your shopping list is influenced by seasonal temperatures or your unique temperament!

YOUR SATISFACTION, OUR PRIORITY
Your satisfaction is our top priority! Our dedicated customer support team is here to assist you at every stage when you shop in our online marketplace. Whether you're searching for the perfect pair of shoes or need help on how to shop effectively, we‚Äôre always ready to assist. Due to temporary changes in tax and shipment policy, our app will try our best to ensure your user experience, so you can shop with peace of mind.

SHOP WITH CONFIDENCE
Safety is our top priority, enabling you to shop confidently, knowing we prioritize secure and reliable transactions. Enjoy worry-free online shopping as you shop through millions of items across countless online stores, including the latest shoes and accessories. From hot summer trends to winter essentials‚Äîno matter the market‚Äôs temperature‚Äîyou‚Äôll always find fresh styles in our ever-expanding store.

JOIN MILLIONS OF HAPPY SHOPPERS
Begin your shopping journey with us today and transform how you shop! Don‚Äôt hesitate‚Äîshop now and discover everything our online marketplace, AliExpress, has to offer, from trendy shoes and wholesale supplies to all the essentials you need in one convenient location! Whether your style is timeless or temporary, our store is your ultimate destination to shop for all your needs.

apps.name: WhatsApp Business
apps.description:
Everything you love about WhatsApp plus built-in tools for business WhatsApp Business is a free-to-download app with built-in tools to help you work smarter, build trust, and grow your business. 

You get  free calls* and free international messaging* plus business features to help you do more with conversations.


Download the app to get business benefits like these:
‚Ä¢ Work smarter. Save time by letting the app do the work for you! Send customers automated quick replies and away messages so you never miss an opportunity. Use labels to quickly organize, filter, and find important conversations. Create a status to share an offer or news, and even take orders and payments** in-app to create a great customer experience. 

‚Ä¢ Build relationships and trust. With a professional business profile on a secure platform,  you build credibility and trust with customers. Use the app to provide more responsive customer support and build long-term loyalty. Subscribe to Meta Verified*** to reinforce your authenticity.

‚Ä¢ Sell more and grow. Get discovered, advertise, and make more valuable customer connections. Boost sales by sending targeted offers to customers; create ads that click to WhatsApp; showcase your product catalog; and give customers the convenience of in-app orders and payments.**


FAQs
Are all features free?
The app is free to download and use, with a mix of free and paid features.

Can I still use my personal WhatsApp?
Yes! As long as you have two different phone numbers, your business and personal accounts can live together on a single device.  

Can I transfer over my chat history?
Yes. When you set up the WhatsApp Business app, you can restore a backup from your WhatsApp account to transfer your messages, media, and contacts to your business account.

How many devices can I connect?
You can have a total of five web-based devices or mobile phones on your account (up to 10 if you subscribe to Meta Verified***). 

*Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.
**Not available in all markets
***Available soon globally

End the overspend
Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
